rsm:MethodUsed.rsm:Designation: The molecular weights of the gases combusted are known as is the volume combusted. The quantities of NOx generated is calculated from this data.

The molecular weights of the gases combusted are known as is the volume combusted. The quantity of sulphur removed from the gas mains by desulphurisation is also known.The quantities of SOx generated is calculated from this data.
